mapper.select: SELECT T_ID ,FN_FILE_PATH(PHOTO_ID) AS PHOTO_PATH ,TEACHER_NAME FROM TEACHER_INFO WHERE TEACHER_STATE = 'C040100'

SELECT S_ID ,C_ID ,T_ID ,CLASS_NAME ,DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_DATE, '%M') AS DATE_M ,DATE_FORMAT(SCHEDULE_DATE, '%d') AS DATE_D ,START_TIME ,END_TIME ,TEACHER_NAME ,CODE_NAME ,T_ID FROM ( ( SELECT T.T_ID AS T_ID, S.SCHEDULE_DATE AS SCHEDULE_DATE, TIME_FORMAT(S.START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS START_TIME, TIME_FORMAT(S.END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS END_TIME, T.TEACHER_NAME AS TEACHER_NAME, FN_CODE_NAME(C.CLASS_LEVEL) AS CODE_NAME, S.S_ID, C.C_ID, C.CLASS_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE_INFO S JOIN CLASS_INFO C ON S.C_ID=C.C_ID JOIN TEACHER_INFO T ON T.T_ID=C.T_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND S.SCHEDULE_DATE = CURDATE() AND ADDTIME(S.START_TIME, '00:30:00') >= CURTIME()
ORDER BY S.SCHEDULE_DATE ASC )
UNION
( SELECT T.T_ID AS T_ID, S.SCHEDULE_DATE AS SCHEDULE_DATE, TIME_FORMAT(S.START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS START_TIME, TIME_FORMAT(S.END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS END_TIME, T.TEACHER_NAME AS TEACHER_NAME, FN_CODE_NAME(C.CLASS_LEVEL) AS CODE_NAME, S.S_ID, C.C_ID, C.CLASS_NAME
FROM SCHEDULE_INFO S JOIN CLASS_INFO C ON S.C_ID=C.C_ID JOIN TEACHER_INFO T ON T.T_ID=C.T_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND S.SCHEDULE_DATE > CURDATE()
ORDER BY S.SCHEDULE_DATE ASC ) ) newTable
ORDER BY SCHEDULE_DATE ASC LIMIT 3;
